item.description: The paper accepted to EMSOFT 2019 was nominated for Best Paper Award.
Started as a PhD student in Tsinghua University.
One paper got accepted to EMSOFT 2019.
I received my BS degree from BUPT.

item.title: Homepage
item.description: About I am a PhD student in the School of Software, Tsinghua University, advised by Prof Yu Jiang. I received my BS degree from School of Computer Science, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications in 2019.6. Research My research is focused on automated vulnerability detection and program analysis of network protocol implementations via techniques like fuzzing, where I investigate practical topics such as efficiency, scalability, and reliability of automated techniques via theoretical and empirical analysis.
